options.text: Collapse the duplicate moon by recalculating tides (choose logic).

Let ripples overrun and archive the anomalies (choose corruption).

WORLD_CONTEXT.recent_events: the courtyard scene tries to replay itself

scene.description: Stairs lead down and up at the same time. The courtyard reappears, but banners read your thoughts.

options.text: Break the loop by enforcing linear time (choose logic).
Confess a memory to the banners to soften the loop (choose emotion).
Let the loop deepen; write nothing and watch (choose corruption).
